description.greeting: Let's get to know each other!
description.presentation: My name is Toto and I am your French teacher, a qualified specialist from the Sorbonne and a DEFL/DALF examiner with over 8 years of experience.

servicesSection.title: Course
servicesSection.subTitle: Choose a course format that suits yout
servicesSection.groupLessonCardContent: The most effective way to learn French is in a small, friendly company..
servicesSection.individualLessonCardContent: Choose a schedule and class pace that suits you! A fully personalized program...
servicesSection.delfDalfPreparationLessonContent: This course will allow you to prepare for the exam as quickly as possible and obtain the coveted diploma...
servicesSection.businessLessonContent: This course will help you develop your professional communication skills, learn everything about business correspondence in French companies...
